Posts.EditableText:
Is it possible to delete a game?

If the game is published, is there any any way to delete it?
Posts.HTML:
Is it possible to delete a game?

If the game is published, is there any any way to delete it?

Posts.EditableText: I was wondering the same thing.
Posts.HTML: I was wondering the same thing.

Posts.EditableText: Don't think so. Once it's up, it's up. After awhile of being up there though the game will disappear. At least, that's what I noticed on a few games 2 years ago.
Posts.HTML: Don't think so. Once it's up, it's up. After awhile of being up there though the game will disappear. At least, that's what I noticed on a few games 2 years ago.

Posts.EditableText: ya, I think the only way at the moment, is to ask alex to delete the game for you (I think you can upload a new game over your old one, but this isn't deleting it, obviously). I think someone else asked about this too, so I think it has already been ticketed as something that maybe alex will implement into the website, for people to delete their published games.
Posts.HTML: ya, I think the only way at the moment, is to ask alex to delete the game for you (I think you can upload a new game over your old one, but this isn't deleting it, obviously). I think someone else asked about this too, so I think it has already been ticketed as something that maybe alex will implement into the website, for people to delete their published games.

Posts.EditableText: You could always just edit it and change it to unlisted.
Posts.HTML: You could always just edit it and change it to unlisted.
